alert.note: Alert for Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 24 at 7:08PM HST until November 25 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... .Surf along exposed north and west facing shores will gradually lower through the weekend as a significant northwest swell moves through. Heights should dip below the advisory levels by Monday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf 6 to 8 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of Big Island best exposed to northwest swell. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
